Calling of libraries
```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
library(caret)
library(rpart)
library(base)
```

```{r}
#Preparing data frame
new_data <- data.frame(
  Glucose = c(127, 173),
  BMI = c(26, 32),
  BloodPressure = c(30, 67),
  Insulin = c(30, 0)
)
```

```{r}
#Loading the model
model <- readRDS("Diabetes Prediction.rds")
```

```{r}
#Predictions
prediction <- predict(model, new_data)
prediction
accuracy_pred <- model$results$Accuracy[1]
accuracy_pred
```
